segments.text: Oh , Linda . You must be so excited about going to study in America .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh yes I am . I have always wanted to go to the States . I love meeting new people and making new friends .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I am sure you will .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am a little worried about my host family . You know , in the agreement , I have to do some cooking for them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I am just afraid they won't like my Chinese way of cooking .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , listen , you'll soon learn , and I am sure they will explain to you how they like to get prepared .
segments.speaker: S1
